name: Peaks and troughs
disambiguatingDescription: Method of analysing and visualizing diachronic data, which applies a non-linear regression model (specifically GAM) to data points that show the development of a linguistic variable over time in order to identify statistically significant outliers.
description: Method of analysing and visualizing diachronic data, which applies a non-linear regression model (specifically GAM) to data points that show the development of a linguistic variable over time in order to identify statistically significant outliers.
